DOC.brief_summary: This study provide data response 24 month two commercial weight loss program ( center-based telephone-based ) compare control condition .
DOC.detailed_description: The first study aim test , randomize control trial , whether participation multifaceted traditional center-based commercial weight loss intervention program and/or telephone-delivered commerical program associate great degree weight loss six , 12 , 18 month whether weight loss maintain 24-month period overweight obese woman , compare usual care control condition . This study utilize randomize study design subject assign center-based weight loss program , telephone-delivered program , usual care control group . The second study aim describe effect participation weight loss program ( versus control condition ) circulate lipid ( fast total plasma cholesterol triglyceride , low-density lipoprotein [ LDL ] cholesterol , high-density lipoprotein [ HDL ] cholesterol ) , carotenoid ( biomarker vegetable fruit intake ) , insulin , glucose , leptin , C-reactive protein , vitamin D , cardiopulmonary fitness . The center-based intervention involve in-person counseling obtain food item center , whereas telephone-delivered program involve telephone counsel food deliver home every two week . Secondary aim study involve describe characteristic associate great weight loss maintenance two intervention arm . The hypothesis test select participant characteristic , old young age , might differentially associate great success across two type program approach . Notably , result study would contribute valuable data scientific knowledge base regard various modality communication behavioral intervention ( in-person versus telephone counseling ) . This important issue currently consider debate among clinical community-based behavioral nutritional scientist whose intervention effort focus promote behavior change positive effect health-related outcome weight reduction .
DOC.criteria: Aged 18 year old Initial BMI > 25.0 kg/m2 < 40 kg/m2 A minimum 15 kg ideal weight define 1983 Metropolitan Life Insurance table Willing able participate clinic visit JC facility interaction specify interval maintain contact investigator 24 month Willing allow blood collection Capable perform simple test assess cardiopulmonary fitness Inability participate physical activity severe disability ( e.g. , severe arthritic condition ) A history presence comorbid diseases diet modification increase physical activity may contraindicate Selfreported pregnancy breastfeed planning pregnancy within next two year Currently actively involve another diet intervention study organize weight loss program Having history presence significant psychiatric disorder condition , investigator 's judgment , would interfere participation trial
